name: QAView
summary: QAView visualizes dependencies in between elemets of 2 arrays.
description: QAView represents 2 UIScrollViews: _questionsScroller & _answersScroller populated with 2 arrays: _questions & _answers respectively. When a question is tapped, it becomes active and ready to be connected to answers. Use this pod whenever you have to visualize dependencies in between elements of 2 arrays.
